column4: so my 3 year old got ahold of my computer and ended up trashing my desktop folder.  I created a new folder in my home directory called Desktop and put my stuff back in it.  but none of it shows up on the desktop.  how can I fix this?
it was you, tell the truth!
not completely.  I logged out and back in

I wish.  I've done stupid stuff before, but he was playing a game on it, and I didn't notice he had closed the game and was playing move the folder around.  took me hours to track down where he moved everything too
